be.\""},{"lineNumber":101094,"originalJapaneseLine":"「デコちゃん言うこと","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Deco-chan's words"},{"lineNumber":101095,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いつも変わらないから無視するとしてー」","translatedEnglishLine":"never change, so let's just ignore that—\""},{"lineNumber":101096,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょ、なによその扱いー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-wait, what kind of treatment is that?!\""},{"lineNumber":101097,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わわわ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-w-w...\""},{"lineNumber":101098,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貴方はこの辺りどう考えてるのかしら？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What do you think about this, around here?\""},{"lineNumber":101099,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん、うち？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hm, me?\""},{"lineNumber":101100,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うちそんなんよぅ考えんよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't really think about that kind of thing.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 口の方がおかしいんだから」
こういう形で国主が揃って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "for all the rulers to gather like this,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お茶を飲む機会があるなんて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "and have an occasion to drink tea together..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 公式の場以外で、となると

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: this is the first time in history."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう考えると、まるで夢のようですね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thinking of it that way, it's almost like a dream..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 良い子組は置いておいて……」
「この茶会は何が狙いなのかしら？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What is the purpose of this tea party, I wonder?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジロリとマジックがリアを睨む。
「あ〜ら、自分と同じような立場の子達と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh my, is it strange to want to deepen friendships with girls in similar positions as myself?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 親交を深めたいと思うのがおかしい？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is it strange to want to build close relations?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （デコちゃんは……いつも通りでいいとして）
み〜んなダーリンを狙ってるんでしょ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are all aiming for Darling, aren't they...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （リア自身の目でその辺り探ってみないと）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Ria needs to investigate that for herself.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、別に本題ってわけじゃなくて、
ただの雑談なんだけどね？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's just casual chatter though, you know?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今やダーリンも世界を率いる英雄じゃない？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Isn't Darling now a hero leading the world?"
Ria's eyes gleamed for a moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「誰がダーリンの正室になるのか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The question is, who will become Darling's official wife,
that's what this talk is about..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 茶会の場が一瞬にして緊張感に包まれる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The tea party was instantly wrapped in tension.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （こいつ……やっぱり、そんな話をする為に……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (This one... was really here to bring up such a topic...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奥様ってシィルさんじゃないんですか？」
クリティカルヒット放ちますね」
「こういう子がいっちゃん怖いねん。
「ランスの正室なら、私がなるわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If it's Lance's official wife, it'll be me."
"Originally, I was supposed to marry Lance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私の筈だったんだからね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's how it was supposed to be."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつも変わらないから無視するとしてー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: never change, so let's just ignore that—"
"W-wait, what kind of treatment is that?!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴方はこの辺りどう考えてるのかしら？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What do you think about this, around here?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うちそんなんよぅ考えんよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't really think about that kind of thing."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
